### Alerts & Cross-refs

To emphasize specific words or text, you can:

- Use the default `.alert` class, e.g. [important note]{.alert}.
- Use the `.fg` class for custom color, e.g. [important note]{.fg}.
- Use the `.bg` class for custom background, e.g. [important note]{.bg}.
